_sText:
training_aim3 by kataS [ESP] Train your aim, go pro!!! EDIT: I reuploaded the bsp file fixing a small bug that changed some textures when changing the texture detail setting (Size displayed 180, 120 and 50 instead of 16R, 10R and 3R). I didn't change the map name since it is an offline map and I didn't considered it necesary. Hello CS:S Aimers =D!!, here I am with my new map training_aim3 :DD, yes it's finally here and it has 4 new training modes and an awesome control panel that will let you to configure absolute EVERYTHING!! Actually training_aim is used by professional players to train their aim :P, big thanks to RpK (VERYGAMES player) to write that really nice article that got this map higher. I have worked REALLY HARD for this map, about 100 hours of intensive mapping in two weeks. I improved almost everything!!: 4 new training modes like reflex training, bursts, intensive...; fully configurable targets (head shaped, size, color, shots to kill...); an awesome control panel made with almost 240 custom textures with photoshop :P, etc... If you want the original VMF file and all the custom files (textures and cfgs) you can download them from here. IMPORTANT: since source engine is not perfect try to shoot ahead of dynamic targets. Sometimes you hit them and nothing happens, it's like a ghost target were a little advanced from the original one. Try to shoot at that "ghost target" ;).
Changelog >> Entirely updated control panel and weapons panel.
>> Help buttons that will show up well detailed instructions in your console (It won't work playing the map in an online server)
>> You can use everybutton by shooting it.
>> Added an additional counter that counts how many shots did you fail in each training.
>> Added a teleport panel for not wasting your time going throw ladders to different levels.
>> Different sizes for the targets and heap shaped ones.
>> 4 new training modes (Classic, angles and sliding, reflex training, burst training and intensive fast aiming).
>> Now you can choose random duration or delay for classic mode.
>> The ent_data has been reduced A LOT by remaking almos the entire entities system so the map is more optimized now :).
>> Created a new texture for targets that will prevent them from having shots decals.
>> New friendly skybox and added some glasses in the roof :P (Better looking).
>> Fixed a bug that caused the targets to keep being spawned once the training was over when 0.00 sec. delay option was choosed.
>> Fixed a CS:S crash bug when you unselect all target types in classic mode (Now you will never be able to unselect all of them).
>> New option that allows you to set the number of shots to kill each target (So you can practise bursting, in addition to the bursting training mode).

How to use: Open CS:S, create a server and select training_aim3 in the maps list (don't allow bots). Join a team, choose a weapon, set your configuration and go the level you want. Then click start button and wait 2 seconds for the first target to appear, you can practise moving left and right or being stand in a position. If you liked it please Rate and Comment =) Installation Instructions: Go to your game cstrike/maps directory (normally C:\\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\USER\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps) and extract the bsp file there.
